page.title: 11Thorney Ghosts.
page.content: { Medicine Pond}is a{mysterious}place which has{weird}tales;this is the most frightening. One{dark and stormy night a man was going to{Whittlesey}to fetch help because his wife was dying. The man saw the lights of{Whittlesey.}When he got to the house of the{Doctor}it was pouring with rain. He asked the {Doctor}if he could come to Thorney,and the{Doctor}said"Yes". The{Doctor}said that the man could sleep at his house until morning while he set off along the winding roads and muddy tracks. Eventually he saw the sign that said{Thorney.}Suddenly his horses reared up and ran,the{whisky}coach went into the pond that was nearby,and the{Doctor}was drowned. All his medicines spilled out, and the pond has been called Medicine Pond ever since. People say that you can still hear the carriage going by.
